page.shortlink: mobileappframework panelnavigator with list menu in controlbar disclosure

description.p: A framework for a mobile application with a Panel Navigator and multiple Panel Cards that are navigated by selecting the panel to display from a List shown in a ControlBar disclosure menu.

The *[ui:MobileAppFramework_PanelNavigator_with_List_menu_in_ControlBar_Disclosure]* template is an application layout with a dropdown menu for navigating multiple views, or "Panels". The UX Component template contains a Panel Navigator with multiple Panel Cards and a header with a ControlBar. The ControlBar has a button that displays a list of menu options. When an option is selected, the app navigates to one of the panels. The menu options are created using a List, which is placed inside an [Injectible container] which is shown in the ControlBar's disclosure.
